name: Herobrine: The Recipe
description:
The Story:

You are camping alone in Minecraft and suddenly feel the urge to bake a cake, You walk around the campsites but find no one else around. As you wonder what happened to them a supernatural Minecraft legend watches from a far waiting to strike his next victim.....

The Objective:

As you try to escape this supernatural being who is viciously hunting you down, you are to go around to neighboring camps in your area and collect materials at the chests to bake a cake and then return to the crafting table.

Compatibility:

The game runs very well on windows, however I can not guarantee the same for Linux and Apple as I do not have them to test this.

This is my first 3D game I have created, any feedback would be greatly appreciated!
